mapper.select: with g1 as ( SELECT SPU.SPU_WID, SUM(T.PRICE*T.QUANTITY-T.DISCOUNT) REAL_FEE FROM W_ORDER_DETAILS T,W_DATE DT,(SELECT PRODUCT_ID,SPU_WID FROM W_PRODUCT) spu WHERE T.ORDER_DT_WID=DT.ROW_WID AND T.PRODUCT_ID=SPU.PRODUCT_ID AND T.VALID_STATUS=1 AND DT.row_wid >=#{startDt} AND DT.row_wid <=#{endDt} GROUP BY SPU.SPU_WID ) select UO_LC_SPU_LIST.SPU_WID, SPU_NAME, STOCK_NUM, SALES_NUM, TIME_TO_MARKET, STOCKBYSALES, ONSALE_DURATION, SALE_BEGIN_DT, SALE_END_DT, nvl(REAL_FEE,0) REAL_FEE from UO_LC_SPU_LIST left JOIN g1 on g1.spu_wid=UO_LC_SPU_LIST.spu_wid

with g1 as ( SELECT SPU.SPU_WID, count(distinct case when t.is_fp='Y' then t.user_id end) NEWUSER, count(distinct case when t.is_fp='N' then t.user_id end) OLDUSER FROM W_ORDER_DETAILS T,W_DATE DT,(SELECT PRODUCT_ID,SPU_WID FROM W_PRODUCT) spu WHERE T.ORDER_DT_WID=DT.ROW_WID AND T.PRODUCT_ID=SPU.PRODUCT_ID AND T.VALID_STATUS=1 AND DT.row_wid >=#{startDt} AND DT.row_wid <=#{endDt} GROUP BY SPU.SPU_WID ) select UO_LC_SPU_LIST.SPU_WID, SPU_NAME, STOCK_NUM, SALES_NUM, TIME_TO_MARKET, STOCKBYSALES, ONSALE_DURATION, SALE_BEGIN_DT, SALE_END_DT, nvl(NEWUSER,0) NEWUSER, nvl(OLDUSER,0) OLDUSER from UO_LC_SPU_LIST left JOIN g1 on g1.spu_wid=UO_LC_SPU_LIST.spu_wid

with g1 as ( SELECT SPU.SPU_WID, count(distinct t.order_id) pocount FROM W_ORDER_DETAILS T,W_DATE DT,(SELECT PRODUCT_ID,SPU_WID FROM W_PRODUCT) spu WHERE T.ORDER_DT_WID=DT.ROW_WID AND T.PRODUCT_ID=SPU.PRODUCT_ID AND T.VALID_STATUS=1 AND DT.row_wid >=#{startDt} AND DT.row_wid <=#{endDt} GROUP BY SPU.SPU_WID ) select UO_LC_SPU_LIST.SPU_WID, SPU_NAME, STOCK_NUM, SALES_NUM, TIME_TO_MARKET, STOCKBYSALES, ONSALE_DURATION, SALE_BEGIN_DT, SALE_END_DT, nvl(POCOUNT,0) POCOUNT from UO_LC_SPU_LIST left JOIN g1 on g1.spu_wid=UO_LC_SPU_LIST.spu_wid

with g1 as ( SELECT SPU.SPU_WID, (CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.ORDER_ID)=0 THEN 0 ELSE TRUNC(SUM(QUANTITY)/COUNT(DISTINCT t.ORDER_ID),2) END) JOINRATE FROM W_ORDER_DETAILS T,W_DATE DT,(SELECT PRODUCT_ID,SPU_WID FROM W_PRODUCT) spu WHERE T.ORDER_DT_WID=DT.ROW_WID AND T.PRODUCT_ID=SPU.PRODUCT_ID AND T.VALID_STATUS=1 AND DT.row_wid >=#{startDt} AND DT.row_wid <=#{endDt} GROUP BY SPU.SPU_WID ) select UO_LC_SPU_LIST.SPU_WID, SPU_NAME, STOCK_NUM, SALES_NUM, TIME_TO_MARKET, STOCKBYSALES, ONSALE_DURATION, SALE_BEGIN_DT, SALE_END_DT, NVL(JOINRATE,0) JOINRATE from UO_LC_SPU_LIST left JOIN g1 on g1.spu_wid=UO_LC_SPU_LIST.spu_wid

with g1 as ( SELECT SPU.SPU_WID, (CASE WHEN SUM(t.QUANTITY)=0 THEN 0 ELSE TRUNC(SUM(t.PRICE*QUANTITY-t.DISCOUNT)/SUM(t.QUANTITY),2) END) SPRICE FROM W_ORDER_DETAILS T,W_DATE DT,(SELECT PRODUCT_ID,SPU_WID FROM W_PRODUCT) spu WHERE T.ORDER_DT_WID=DT.ROW_WID AND T.PRODUCT_ID=SPU.PRODUCT_ID AND T.VALID_STATUS=1 AND DT.row_wid >=#{startDt} AND DT.row_wid <=#{endDt} GROUP BY SPU.SPU_WID ) select UO_LC_SPU_LIST.SPU_WID, SPU_NAME, STOCK_NUM, SALES_NUM, TIME_TO_MARKET, STOCKBYSALES, ONSALE_DURATION, SALE_BEGIN_DT, SALE_END_DT, NVL(SPRICE,0) SPRICE from UO_LC_SPU_LIST left JOIN g1 on g1.spu_wid=UO_LC_SPU_LIST.spu_wid
